cause.description:
OmniPeace was founded by Los Angeles-based entrepreneur, Mary Fanaro, whose vision is to address vital humanitarian needs through the distribution and sale of consumer products, raise awareness of extreme poverty in sub-Saharan Africa and galvanize support for Millennium Promise. By purchasing an OmniPeace branded product, consumers now have the vehicles to become activists while participating in Millennium Promise’s call to action. There comes a time in every generation when civilization redefines itself and momentum builds to bring down a status quo that people are no longer willing to accept; the abolition of slavery, woman's liberation, the fall of the Berlin wall, apartheid and now extreme poverty and disease. Help give the poorest people in the world a chance to survive by purchasing an OmniPeace branded product. For more information go the the official OmniPeace website - http://omni-peace.com/
1. We can save the lives of 30 million children who would otherwise die before reaching the age of 5.
2. More than 500 million people will no longer struggle to live on less than $1 a day.
3. # More than 250 million people will no longer suffer from hunger.
